data.text:
After the completion of the Westminster Bridge Hotel in London our company had the opportunity to get involved at Project Management Level with the refurbishment and upgrade of the largest Hospitality project in Croatia, the complete refurbishment of the Hotels and camping sites portfolio of Arena Tourism Hospitality group in Istria, Croatia.

As part of our company’s responsibilities, we had to plan, budget and monitor the refurbishment of Verudela Resort in Pula, which is one of the 3 resorts, 4 hotels and 3 camping sites owned by Arena Tourism Company in Croatia.

Our part of the project included in the first phase the upgrading of a 3 star, 385 rooms hotel and apartments to a 4* hotel in addition to 80 villas, bungalows, a traditional shopping street, an open air theatre and the Verudela Beach area.

This project was completed within 3 years and had a total budget of Euro 80m.
